attributes.action: The referendum vote is void if the Union of the United Kingdom is ended.
attributes.background:
The 1st referendum vote is not legitimate if it breaks up of the United Kingdom. This consequence was not explained to voters and so a balanced and fair referendum was not held.

The 1st referendum vote may now cause the Scots to dissolve the Union. 

A second referendum is required.

rejection.details:
If you want a second referendum, we already have a petition open about that: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753

If you want to stop a second referendum on Scottish independence, we also already have a petition open about that: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
